item.description:
THE SCENE: This is a new event site.  I've driven by this restaurant and it has two things I like very much (besides food).  A gazebo, and a very pretty lake.  The gazebo is quite aside from the restaurant and so I don't think they impact one another, though I would like to stop in afterwards for a bite.

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

RSVP POLICY: ***NOTE THAT THIS EVENT IS SUBJECT TO CANCELLATION IF THERE ARE 3 OR FEWER ARTISTS RSVPd.  SO CHECK YOUR INBOX OR THIS CALENDAR THE DAY OF THE EVENT***

SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS: If the temperature is less than 50, or 60 with marginal weather conditions, we'll meet elsewhere indoors.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

DIRECTIONS: It's on route 20, just before Marlborough Center.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant,  Paper towels,  Sweater, water, food

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. If in doubt, feel free to contact me.

CONTACT:
Michael Emerald, CFA
Organizer
617/968-0627
Emerald@PerformanceBusinessDesign.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Marlboro, MA lake at Stephen Anthony's Restaurant
